verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> the feast <S%G1859><s%> of unleavened bread, <S%G106><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> drew near. <S%G1448><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might put him <S%G846><s%> to death, <S%G337><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> who was surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> who was <S%G5607><s%> numbered <S%G706><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the twelve. <S%G1427><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> went away, <S%G565><s%> and talked <S%G4814><s%> with the chief priests <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> captains <S%G4755><s%> about how <S%G4459><s%> he might deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to them. <S%G846><s%>
They <S%G2532><s%> were glad, <S%G5463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> agreed <S%G4934><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> money. <S%G694><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> consented, <S%G1843><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> an opportunity <S%G2120><s%> to deliver <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to them <S%G846><s%> in the absence of <S%G817><s%> the multitude. <S%G3793><s%>
The <S%G2064><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> of unleavened bread <S%G1722><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> on which <S%G3739><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be sacrificed. <S%G2380><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> saying, <S%G2036><s%> "Go <S%G4198><s%> and prepare <S%G2090><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> for us, <S%G2254><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may eat. <S%G5315><s%>"
They <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> do you <S%G2309><s%> want us to prepare? <S%G2090><s%>"

He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> when you <S%G5216><s%> have entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> carrying <S%G941><s%> a pitcher <S%G2765><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> will <S%G4876><s%> meet <S%G4876><s%> you. <S%G5213><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> which <S%G3757><s%> he enters. <S%G1531><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Tell <S%G2046><s%> the master <S%G1320><s%> of the house, <S%G3614><s%> <S%G1320><s%> 'The Teacher says <S%G2046><s%> to you, <S%G4671><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the guest room, <S%G2646><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> I may eat <S%G5315><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> disciples? <S%G3101><s%>"'
He <S%G2548><s%> will show <S%G1166><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> a large, <S%G3173><s%> furnished <S%G4766><s%> upper room. <S%G508><s%> Make preparations <S%G2090><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>"

They <S%G1161><s%> went, <S%G565><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> things as <S%G2531><s%> he had told <S%G2046><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they prepared <S%G2090><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> he <S%G846><s%> sat down <S%G377><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> apostles. <S%G652><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "I have earnestly <S%G1939><s%> desired <S%G1939><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> suffer, <S%G3958><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3754><s%> I will <S%G5315><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> longer by any means eat <S%G5315><s%> of it until <S%G2193><s%> it is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G1209><s%> a cup, <S%G4221><s%> and when he had given thanks, <S%G2168><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> "Take <S%G2983><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> share <S%G1266><s%> it among yourselves, <S%G1438><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3756><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G3756><s%> will <S%G4095><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> at all again from the fruit <S%G1081><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the vine, <S%G288><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> comes. <S%G2064><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and when he had given thanks, <S%G2168><s%> he broke <S%G2806><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> memory <S%G364><s%> of me. <S%G1699><s%>"

Likewise, <S%G5615><s%> he <S%G2532><s%> took the cup <S%G4221><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> supper, <S%G1172><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> is the new <S%G2537><s%> covenant <S%G1242><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is poured <S%G1632><s%> out for <S%G5228><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the hand <S%G5495><s%> of him who <S%G3588><s%> betrays <S%G3860><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> is with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the table. <S%G5132><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> goes, <S%G4198><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> it has been determined, <S%G3724><s%> but <S%G4133><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> to that <S%G1565><s%> man <S%G444><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he is betrayed! <S%G3860><s%>"

They <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to question <S%G4802><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> <S%G687><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> it was <S%G1498><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> would <S%G3195><s%> do <S%G4238><s%> this thing. <S%G5124><s%>

There <S%G1161><s%> arose also <S%G2532><s%> a contention <S%G5379><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1511><s%> considered <S%G1380><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> greatest. <S%G3187><s%>

He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "The kings <S%G935><s%> of the nations <S%G1484><s%> lord <S%G2961><s%> it over them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> have authority over <S%G1850><s%> them <S%G846><s%> are called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G2110><s%> 'benefactors.'

But <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> with you. <S%G5210><s%> But <S%G235><s%> one who <S%G3588><s%> is the greater <S%G3187><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> let him become <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the younger, <S%G3501><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one who is governing, <S%G2233><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one who <S%G3588><s%> serves. <S%G1247><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> is greater, <S%G3187><s%> one who <S%G3588><s%> sits at the table, <S%G345><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> one who <S%G3588><s%> serves? <S%G1247><s%> Isn't <S%G3780><s%> it he who <S%G3588><s%> sits at the table? <S%G345><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1722><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one who <S%G3588><s%> serves. <S%G1247><s%>
But you <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> have continued <S%G1265><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> trials. <S%G3986><s%>
I <S%G2504><s%> confer <S%G1303><s%> on you <S%G5213><s%> a kingdom, <S%G932><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> conferred <S%G1303><s%> on me, <S%G3427><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> you may eat <S%G2068><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> table <S%G5132><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Kingdom. <S%G932><s%> You <S%G2532><s%> will sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> thrones, <S%G2362><s%> judging <S%G2919><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>"

The <S%G1161><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Simon, <S%G4613><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> asked <S%G1809><s%> to have you, <S%G5209><s%> that he might sift <S%G4617><s%> you as <S%G5613><s%> wheat, <S%G4621><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> prayed <S%G1189><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you, <S%G4675><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> wouldn't <S%G3361><s%> fail. <S%G1587><s%> <S%G2532><s%> You, <S%G4218><s%> when once you <S%G4771><s%> have turned again, <S%G1994><s%> establish <S%G4741><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>"

He said, <S%G2036><s%> "I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G4671><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> the rooster will <S%G5455><s%> by no <S%G3364><s%> means crow <S%G5455><s%> today <S%G4594><s%> until <S%G4250><s%> you <S%G2228><s%> deny <S%G533><s%> that <S%G4250><s%> you know <S%G1492><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> three times. <S%G5151><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "When <S%G3753><s%> I sent <S%G649><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> out without <S%G817><s%> purse, <S%G905><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wallet, <S%G4082><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shoes, <S%G5266><s%> did you <S%G5302><s%> lack <S%G3361><s%> anything? <S%G5100><s%>" They <S%G1161><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Nothing. <S%G3762><s%>"

Then <S%G3767><s%> he <S%G2036><s%> said to them, <S%G846><s%> "But <S%G235><s%> now, <S%G3568><s%> whoever <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> a purse, <S%G905><s%> let him take <S%G142><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and likewise <S%G3668><s%> a wallet. <S%G4082><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Whoever <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> none, <S%G3361><s%> <S%G59><s%> let him sell <S%G4453><s%> his <S%G846><s%> cloak, <S%G2440><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> buy a sword. <S%G3162><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is written <S%G1125><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> be fulfilled <S%G5055><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me: <S%G1698><s%> <S%G2532><s%> 'He was counted <S%G3049><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> transgressors. <S%G459><s%>' For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> which concerns <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> an end. <S%G5056><s%>"

They <S%G1161><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> are two <S%G1417><s%> swords. <S%G3162><s%>" He <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "That is <S%G2076><s%> enough. <S%G2425><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> came out, <S%G1831><s%> and went, <S%G4198><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> his custom <S%G1485><s%> was, <S%G1519><s%> to the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%> <S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> he was <S%G1096><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the place, <S%G5117><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Pray that <S%G4336><s%> you don't <S%G3361><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> was withdrawn <S%G645><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> a stone <S%G3037><s%>'s throw, <S%G1000><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he knelt <S%G5087><s%> down <S%G1119><s%> and prayed, <S%G4336><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Father, <S%G3962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you are willing, <S%G1014><s%> remove <S%G3911><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%> Nevertheless, <S%G4133><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> but <S%G235><s%> yours, <S%G4674><s%> be done. <S%G1096><s%>"
An <S%G1161><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> appeared <S%G3700><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> strengthening <S%G1765><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Being <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> agony <S%G74><s%> he prayed <S%G4336><s%> more earnestly. <S%G1617><s%> <S%G1161><s%> His <S%G846><s%> sweat <S%G2402><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> great drops <S%G2361><s%> of blood <S%G129><s%> falling down <S%G2597><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground. <S%G1093><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> he rose up <S%G450><s%> from <S%G575><s%> his prayer, <S%G4335><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> sleeping <S%G2837><s%> because <S%G575><s%> of grief, <S%G3077><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G2518><s%> sleep? <S%G450><s%> Rise and pray <S%G4336><s%> that you <S%G2518><s%> may not enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> temptation. <S%G3986><s%>"

While <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was still <S%G2089><s%> speaking, <S%G2980><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> a multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> was called <S%G3004><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> was leading <S%G4281><s%> them. <S%G846><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> came near <S%G1448><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to kiss <S%G5368><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Judas, <S%G2455><s%> do you <S%G3860><s%> betray the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> with a kiss? <S%G5370><s%>"

When <S%G1161><s%> those who were <S%G3588><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> what was about <S%G4012><s%> to happen, <S%G2036><s%> they said to him, <S%G846><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> shall <S%G1487><s%> we strike <S%G3960><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword? <S%G3162><s%>"

A <S%G5100><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> struck <S%G3960><s%> the servant <S%G1401><s%> of the high priest, <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cut off <S%G851><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> ear. <S%G3775><s%>
